alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 4:31AM CST until March 01 at 6:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Snow Today... .Snow over Minnesota will increase across western Wisconsin this morning moving north of Interstate 94 later this morning and lasting into the afternoon. Snow rates may increase to one half or one inch in an hour for a short time by 11am or noon with reduced visibilities. A few inches of accumulation look likely. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Taylor County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact midday travelers or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
